arts.ttl: Everton vs Brighton Preview: Premier League, Matchday 2, 2025
arts.sum: Jack Grealish is expected to be selected from the start in this one as the Toffees look for a significant improvement on the attacking performance on display at Elland Road. David Moyes' Everton will play their first ever competitive match at the new Hill Dickinson Stadium as the host of Brighton.

arts.sum: Latest news before the afternoon kick-offs Today’s live matches | Mail Matchday live What else is happening today away from the Premier League? arts.sum: Brighton travel to Everton on Sunday, aiming to spoil the party in the first-ever competitive match at the Hill Dickinson Stadium. arts.sum: Everton are set to play their first-ever competitive match at the new Hill Dickinson Stadium on Sunday, a historic occasion that manager David Moyes is relishing.
